name: Personal Finance Evolution
description:
Speedrun your finances!

Personal Finance Evolution is a Clicker/Idle game where you grow your savings. There are 4 buttons available to you in order to do so:

Work button: trades clicks for money.

Get Education button: upgrades your work button.

Invest button: increases your passive income.

Start Business button: makes each click on the work button upgrade itself.

All of the above is based on real life principles, sped up for your convenience!

Made for: Xanderjam #3
